alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 20 at 2:46AM PDT until August 21 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PDT MONDAY... * CHANGES...None. * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Winds could gust up to 55 mph in heavier rainbands, particularly across extreme eastern Pershing and Churchill counties. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...From 11 PM Sunday to 11 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The eventual track of Hilary`s center of circulation will play a significant role in wind speeds across Central Nevada. Winds will be much stronger to the east of the center.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
